title: I need help to identify this font!
content:
Hello typophiles, I'm needing help to identify this font, anyone recognise it?

Thank you very much!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [escandinavia.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824194733/http:/typophile.com/files/escandinavia.gif) | 2.79 KB |
author: mat180

comments.content:
Exclusive typeface for Volvo called [Volvo Broad](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824194733/http:/typophile.com/node/3875).  
Alternative: [Elston RR](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824194733/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/elston)
